mapper.select: SELECT code_id AS codeId, code_index AS codeIndex, code_value AS codeValue, code_name AS codeName, active AS active, registered_by AS registeredBy, registered_date AS registeredDate, modified_by AS modifiedBy, last_modified AS lastModified FROM systemcode ORDER BY registered_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO systemcode (code_index, code_value, code_name, active, registered_by, registered_date) VALUES (#{codeIndex}, #{codeValue}, #{codeName}, #{active}, #{registeredBy}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);
mapper.update: UPDATE systemcode SET code_Index = #{codeIndex}, code_value = #{codeValue}, code_name = #{codeName}, active = #{active}, modified_by = #{modifiedBy}, last_modified = #{lastModified} WHERE code_id = #{codeId}
